main event: Multiple witnesses observed a disc-shaped, metallic object moving across the sky in a straight line over Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on May 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped and metallic in appearance.
It was observed moving at a high rate of speed in a straight line over Rio de Janeiro.
The sighting was made by multiple reliable witnesses.
The weather conditions were clear with few clouds.
Several photographs of the object were taken and are included in the report.
